response.job_title: Lead Backend Developer at The Biz Nation | Node.Js Developer | Electrical Engineer | DS4A Honors Graduate | Go Developer | DevOps apprentice
response.summary:
I am a driven and passionate engineer with a strong dedication to advancing my expertise in software development. With a deep understanding of innovative technologies and cutting-edge methodologies, I consistently deliver successful projects that exceed expectations. My commitment to continual growth ensures that I stay at the forefront of industry trends and best practices, allowing me to consistently provide exceptional results.

With excellent communication skills and a collaborative mindset, I thrive in cross-functional team environments, effectively working with others to achieve project objectives and drive tangible business outcomes. My proficiency in backend development enables me to craft robust and scalable applications that demonstrate exceptional performance and functionality. As a natural leader, I excel at coordinating and inspiring teams to reach their full potential. I am not afraid to step out of my comfort zone to learn and extract maximum value from new experiences. I am excited to explore new opportunities that allow me to leverage my skills and experience as an engineer and developer, providing a platform for personal and professional growth.
response.skills: Cybersecurity, Go, Code Review, Teamwork, DevOps, Solution Architecture, Docker, Back-End Web Development, Node.js, Python, TypeScript, SQL, Git, Linux, Software Development, API Development, Amazon Web Services (AWS), Data Science, Data Lakes, Desarrollo front end

profile_positions.description:
- Conduct unitary and integration tests to ensure functionality and code quality.
- Upgrade legacy code performance by 35% through refactoring and optimization techniques.
- Execute code reviews enforcing  coding guidelines and clean code practices, reducing errors by 60%.
- Implement linters and formatting tools to ensure code consistency and readability.
- Decreased maintenance burden by 50% through the implementation of clean code practices.
- Execute gitflow for streamlined merging and continuous deployment of new features.
- Enforce the use of Jira for project tracking, significantly enhancing requirements delivery.
- Dockerized Angular, Express, and NestJs applications, reducing deployment times by 30% and errors due to incompatible environments by 80%.
profile_positions.title: Lead Backend Developer

profile_positions.description:
- Built and maintained high-performance REST APIs on AWS using Node.js, resulting in a 40% improvement in overall system performance.
- Collaborated with cross-functional teams to analyze user stories and design software solutions, contributing to the development of new features.
- Improved database efficiency by creating optimized structures and configurations, enhancing query flows and load management.
- Proficient in TypeScript, SQL, API Development, Software Development, and Amazon Web Services (EC2).
profile_positions.title: Back End Developer

school.name: Data Science for All by Correlation One

education.field_of_study: Data Processing and Data Processing Technology/Technician

company.name: The Biz Nation
company.description:
Nuestra especialidad es potencializar el activo más importante que tienen las empresas: su gente.  El uso de tecnología de punta combinado con nuestra innovadora metodología de enseñanza nos permite crear resultados duraderos en la felicidad, sentido de pertenencia, productividad y competitividad de los equipos de trabajo de nuestros clientes.      

Desde los Estados Unidos, hasta Colombia  y el resto de América Latina, nuestras soluciones de aprendizaje virtual permiten que miles de personas en más de 9 países aprendan desde cualquier dispositivo, a cualquier hora y de la mano de instructores expertos.
